text: Smarana karo! Tomara chile upatyakara nikata prante ara tara upatyakara dura prante, ara kaphela chila tomadera ceye ninma bhumite. Ara yadi tomara parasparera madhye kono bandobasta kare thakate tabe e sid'dhante tomara matabheda karate, kintu -- yena allah byapara ekata ghatate parena yeta ghate'i geche, yena yara dhbansa habara se dhbansa hate pare spasta pramanera phale, ara yara bamcabara se bamcate pare spasta pramanera phale. Ara nihsandeha allah abasya'i sarbasrota, sarbajnata.
